title: Trump Approves Sale of More Advanced Nvidia Computer Chips Used in AI to China
description: WASHINGTON (AP) — President Donald Trump said Monday that he would allow Nvidia to sell an advanced type of computer chip used in the development of artificial intelligence to “approved customers” in China.
content:
WASHINGTON (AP) — President Donald Trump said Monday that he would allow Nvidia to sell an advanced type of computer chip used in the development of artificial intelligence to “approved customers” in China.

title: Tech industry welcomes Trump's move for federal AI standards amid state policy patchwork
description: The evolution of artificial intelligence and its integration into everyday life has occurred.
content:
The evolution of artificial intelligence and its integration into everyday life has occurred so rapidly that Congress hasn't kept pace to regulate it, leaving a vacuum for states to fill with a patchwork of laws on AI safety, copyright and more.

title: Canada turns to EU for agreements on AI as Montreal hosts G7 digital, tech ministers
description: OTTAWA — Canada's artificial intelligence minister kicked off two days of meetings among G7 ministers Monday touting new digital agreements with Europe — a move that comes at a time of deep divisions between the EU and the U.S. on AI regulation.
content:

title: Trump Says He'll Sign Executive Order Preempting State AI Regulations
description: Federal policy would likely be more hands off when it comes to regulating artificial intelligence.
content:
President Donald Trump plans to issue an executive order this week that'll create a single set of rules for AI, forgoing the need for companies to litigate across states, according to a post by the president on Truth Social, Monday.

title: Joseph Grinkorn: Tech Will Continue to Reign King of Wall Street in 2026
description: Joseph Grinkorn investment expert & CEO of Morris Group, predicts that technology stocks will continue to outperform major market indices in 2026, driven by artificial intelligence expansion, emerging technologies, and favorable macroeconomic conditions. title: West Michigan has economic momentum, but sees signs of slowdown
